name: Fear in Hospital
description: Fear in Hospital is a terrible survivor horror in hospital where you should find a occult path to exit!

name: Logistics Expert
description: Logistics Expert – a modern simulator for managing a logistics company and heavy equipment with realistic physics!

name: Valley Run
description: You've entered a dangerous valley full of gold and deadly challenges. Ride on a futuristic hover bike collecting coins and power ups along the way to the highest score! Are your reflexes up for the challenge?

name: Eat this!
description: Have you ever tried to feed hungry flowers at the botanic garden? Well, now you have a chance! But careful, it's not so easy!

name: Fantasy Hero Biography
description: This game is based on a turn-based card battle and incorporates a random loop dungeon to explore the RogueLike-style game. Play a variety of characters in the game and experience the ever-changing adventure!

name: Total Party Kill
description: Control 3 different heroes and use their unique abilities to solve mind-bending puzzles by sacrificing your teammates. Throw heroes as the Knight, freeze them into ice blocks with the Mage, or pin them on walls and use them as platforms as the Ranger. As long as one hero survives to the goal, you win the level!

name: Bumpin' Dungeon
description:
Bumpin’ Dungeon is a Swipe-based Mini Puzzle Game with a retro inspired Chiptune Soundtrack & Aesthetic.

Join Hanny as she attempts to escape the Bumpin’ Dungeon while ka-powing the bogus baddies that stand in her way. Get to the exit in the least number of moves possible, but don’t run out or you’re toast! You are probably going to die… a lot. Stick with it! The solution is right in front of you, you super genius, you!

Features:
- 120 Retro Dungeon Puzzle Stages
- 10 All-New Chiptune Tracks
- 8 Diabolical Dingbats
- 1 Coming-of-Age Story
- Epic Loot
- Toaster Pastries

name: Shadowland
description: Shadowland is a 2D platformer where you control lights to use their shadows

name: Sweet Galaxy Adventure!
description: Take on the role of a space cadette who is just about to embark on his first real mission into outer space. Little does he know that the ship that he is about to call home is almost exclusively crewed by beautiful women!

name: Afterlifes
description: Forget what you think about survival games. Here, nature is your greatest enemy and your closest ally... Don't waste what nature gives you. Loot, gather, hunt Matacinas, build and fortify to survive.

name: Kick the Anime Simulator
description: Perform experiments on anime girl characters.  Angry at your boss?  Want to smash all around you?  Want more kicks?

name: Kubifaktorium
description: Build, manage and grow a thriving colony, discover new lands, craft legendary weapons and defeat your enemies. Kubifaktorium will feature different biomes to explore, plenty of resources to exploit, complex machinery to build and interesting production chains to master!

name: Mystery Manor: Hidden Objects
description: If you love secrets, all you need to do is enter Mystery Manor — a world of mystery and adventure will open before you! Follow Joshua the cat, search for hidden objects, explore numerous rooms, meet the amazing inhabitants of the Manor and learn of their great stories.

name: Trial of Temptation
description:
Tales tell of the mythical Shrine of Fate, which resides at the bottom of the Steps of Determination, leading towards the Gong of Truth. However, those tales also describe a harrowing trial for any who approach the Shrine. 
Today, our main protagonist Ping Pe arrives at the Shrine, which he previously believed to be just some myth. Take control and uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: Fugitive Desires
description: You find yourself on the run after being framed for a crime you didn’t commit! You gain the help of two members of the police as well as a journalist looking to find the truth. Are you ready to meet them?

name: Forgotten
description: Forgotten is a game where the main character got into a car accident, but after that, he ended up in an abandoned mansion, and then he realized that he was not alone

name: A Sensei's Story
description: Find out if you have what it takes to teach English in a foreign land as you live, laugh, and love each day in Japan! Experience what it’s like to live and work in the Japanese city of Fukuoka. Make friends, enemies, or lovers out of your fellow co-workers. Teach with kindness and intelligence, or sarcasm and stupidity.

name: Marshmello Music Dance
description: Marshmello Music Dance is a fun and addictive rhythm game based on Marshmello that will challenge your skills and keep you entertained for hours.

name: Generation Zero: Schweet Vanity Pack
description: The summer warmth has finally reached Sweden, and it’s time to celebrate Midsummer with some schweet new outfits from the 1980s. Mix between the various articles from four stylish new sets, each with a unique combination of accessories, clothing and hairstyles. Express your excitement with 5 stellar new emotes, and start dancing around the maypole.

name: After the End with Miaobot
description: Explore the post-war ruins of your city with a robotic cat who wants to be your friend

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers - Collector's Edition
description: The Collector’s Edition includes Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers, the in-game bonus items, Shadowbringers Special Art Box, Expertly Crafted Dark Knight Figure, Shadowbringers Art Book, Shadowbringers Logo Sticker Cling and Final Fantasy XIV Playing Card Deck.

name: The Horizon
description: The final game in the Tower series: a reframing of the original story, partially from a different protagonist; it is again about trans women, time loops, and finding the strength to confront your own self-loathing.

name: They Came From Uranus!
description:
Launch your missiles to intercept the incoming attack and defend your planet from a relentless alien invasion. 
 
Intuitive one-tap gameplay in a remix of a classic retro arcade game with a challenging new twist. 
 
Endless waves of ever-increasing difficulty will test the most skilled of players. 
 
Conserve your limited ammunition by destroying multiple targets with a single shot for bigger scores.

name: As Long As We're Together: Magical Girls Sweet & Pure
description: As Long As We're Together is a very small visual novel about friendship between two girls who also happen to be magical girls. Made for the friendship jam! A single play through is about five minutes, but with lots of variation so you can play the game multiple times.

name: Apex Legends: Season 2
description:
Explore a transformed Kings Canyon!
The Repulsor Tower is down and beasts have taken over the arena. Kings Canyon will never be the same – but the Games go on!

name: World of Riders
description: World Of Riders is the most realistic racing game where you can have a full motorcycle racing experience. Starting with level 1, you can proceed to the higher levels by attending to the competitions and by completing assigned tasks. So you can get credits and buy new motorcycles, or you can use those credits to upgrade power and other specs of existing motorcycle. There are 12 different stages and 2 race tracks in the game. Among them, there are stages in night mode, in rainy and snowy weather. There are 11 different motorcycle options categorized by engine power. You can proceed to higher levels in career mode, get credits in time trail mode.

name: Vollun
description: Vollun is a first-person with great focus on story, puzzles and exploration. You wake up in a strange place full of mysteries. Something happened in this place and you're not alone.

name: Noyo-!
description: Suddenly, people got crazy by "DokuDenpa" from smartphones! JRPG to which one girl and one biped cat go adventure to help everyone!

name: Zombie Rush : Extinction
description: The top of strategy battle game! Build villages and train units to defeat...

name: Aliens and Umbrellas
description: Shoot Aliens with Umbrellas and other Aliens

name: Colonies
description: Build your own colony and defend it with a powerful army of tanks, defensive towers, and different sized mechs on alien planets!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers
description: Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers is the third expansion pack to Final Fantasy XIV Online. The expansion takes the Warrior of Light to the First, one of thirteen reflections of the Source that is being consumed by a Flood of Light. The main region visited is known as Norvrandt, which is roughly analogous to the Source's Eorzea, and is the only region in the world that has not yet succumbed to the Flood of Light.

name: CoolPaintr VR: Voxel
description: Sin descripción

name: Ocean Patrol
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Oddities
description: Green Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game. Created by the Radiance Team, the game, and the entirety of the series, was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously. This fangame is followed by its direct sequel and final chapter, Blue Oddities. The game turned out to be a "troll game," as there is no real gameplay aside from being a 2d free-roam game.

name: Cyberpunk
description:
It’s the beginning of the 22nd century.

Society has collapsed amid rapid technological progress. People are modifying their own bodies extensively. Corporations war with one another over data, which has become the most valuable commodity on the market.

Your group, made up of cyborgs equipped with special skills, has decided to steal some rare data from the archives of an influential corporation. Infiltrating the complex unnoticed, you must get to the archives and download the stack memory. But there won’t be anything easy about that.

name: This Emptiness
description: A Yume Nikki fan game set during the 1960s. Play as a Soviet spy deep inside the United States government who has bad dreams.

name: A Guardian's Wish
description: Many witches exist nowadays, each of them unique in their own way. But what they all have in common is that they have a guardian angel, who visits them in their dreams and guides them throughout their life, trying to lead them to the right way as much as possible. Many angels have a passionate wish to protect their witches, as if they were their children (even though they technically kinda are).

name: Kiss the Girl
description: A game about being a high school girl who's very gay.

name: Fallen London: My Kingdom for a Pig
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Bargains.

name: Cosmic Frontline AR
description:
The cosmic war rages on! Prepare yourself for gorgeous 3D graphics and spectacular spaceship battles. Developed for iPhone and iPad, Cosmic Frontline is the most visually stunning AR strategy game yet.

Ascend to the stars, colonize new worlds and conquer enemy planets. Build your massive spaceship fleet and get ready for the largest battle the galaxy has ever seen. Learn the best tactics, turn the tide of war with the right strategy. Knowing when to defend and when to attack can be the difference between victory and defeat. Plan your moves wisely as you might not have many. Dominate your opponents in monumental spaceship battles. The fate of the galaxy rests in your hands. Be bold or be destroyed!

Well-balanced gameplay, responsive AI and stunning graphics, brilliantly executed with details that require a second look, Cosmic Frontline lets you experience space warfare like nothing you've ever seen on mobile.

name: Zen
description: A chill little puzzle game. Just watch the moving spheres and the paths they leave behind to discover the hidden word.

name: Nono Pixie
description:
A collection of 100 Nonograms (Picross puzzles) originally created for the RGCD 2019 16kb C64 cartridge game jam with additional content (manual, etc.)
The puzzles can be played in any order and can be filtered by theme or played in random order.

name: Space Orbs
description:
Two player cooperative colour match-3 where two players tackle each side of the threat and can transfer orbs between each other to solve the puzzle. There is no time pressure but for each move there may be more orbs filling the screen.
As the levels progress various blockers and bombs will complicate the solution, when no more matches remain on screen a level is completed.

name: Pinball Arcade: Stern Pack 1
description:
Pinball Arcade: Stern Pack 1 contains the following tables:

- Ripley's Believe it or Not!
- Starship Troopers
- Star Trek Vengeance Premium

name: Zombies Ate My Neighbors TC
description: Zombies Ate My Neighbors TC is a Total Conversion mod that aims to recreate the videogame by LucasArts "Zombies Ate My Neighbors" as a first person shooter, recreating the levels of the game as maps in a pseudo 3D environment.

name: Cosmo Flow
description: A Super Mega Ultra Space Race through the galaxy to find an extraction zone back home. Rank up and unlock rare skins: Advanced Alien technology. Above the atmosphere of a strange planet, play Multiplayer against friends or fly Solo. Gravity is unstable and unpredictable. Avoid enemy swarm, everything unknown is a potential threat, good luck, don't get lost.

name: Conversations with Emma
description: A conversation with Emma Goldman about gentrification, Amazon and my subscription box problem.

name: Marron Helps a Friend
description:
Marron's friend, Mugi, has lost the bouquet he needs for the flower dance.
No need to worry though - Marron will help him find it!

name: Dance Dance Girl
description: This game has beautiful graphics and girls,they can dance for you! Come and play together!

name: Redneck Skeet Shooting
description: You take role of a country man who loves to shoot. Your objective is simple - shoot any flying object and master your marksman skills. Destroyed items give you gold coins, which you can use to unlock new locations, guns and playable characters.

name: The Breach: A VR Escape Game
description: The Breach is a Virtual Reality Escape Game set in a futuristic and mysterious atmosphere. Solve a short yet intense and challenging enigma, taking place in an immersive world with a puzzling ambiance. Will you be able to overcome an environment collapsing before your eyes?

name: THC
description: THC is a visual novel for adults.

name: Fairytale Solitaire: Red Riding Hood
description: Discover a most exciting tale!

name: Shenmou
description: Shenmou is a classic turn-based RPG game with European mythological content! Rich plot stories, gorgeous magic skills will bring you and the heroes together to join a game of God and Magic.

name: SurviVR - Castle Defender
description: VR Tower defense game for HTC Vive headset. Join this medieval fantasy world and defend your castle against orcs, trolls, goblins and other creatures! Use your crossbows, bow & arrow, magic spells and swords to slay the enemies!

name: Maze Quest 2: The Desert
description: Maze Quest 2: The Desert is a simple relaxing puzzle game. Play as Ali and find your way to the Lost Pyramid through 100 desert-themed maze levels.

name: LEGO Tower
description: Build and operate your own LEGO Tower! Construct a wide range of apartments and businesses for your Minifigure residents to live, work and play in. Visit your friends’ towers and trade items to help them build. Collect hundreds of unique Minifigure pieces and discover hidden characters. Build your dream LEGO Tower to new heights, the sky's the limit!

name: Tower Arena
description: Tower Arena is turn-based tactical PVP game. For centuries Regulars tried to go up the Tower, with most of them dying on the way. Will you be able to advance to unknown heights. To become a Tower's Ranker ? Or maybe... a king himself ?

name: Under Spire
description: Real-time combat, depth strategy. Card formation, explore the maze.

name: I'm Fine
description:
I'm Fine is a VR suicide awareness experience like no other, the experience is intended to shed light on a very dark and taboo subject that we don't talk about enough.

This is an educational piece of work and has no entertainment value what so ever, it is to be used as a means of experiencing what sufferers of suicidal thoughts go through in their darkest hours, so that you may better understand people who are suicidal.

name: Motu Patlu Car Game 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Eat or Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Push: A Duolingo Horror
description: Duolingo is the most strange HORROR game, because its at first a normal meeting for language lessons! But if you skip or miss a day, he will never let you live for long! This game is not suitable for children, for those who are easily disturbed.

name: Blink of an Eye
description: A continuation to my previous map - Border Town. As usual - theme of the map is set in the city. This time it's set at evening/night.
"Speedmapping" jam pack 198: 16 SP levels + a start map. Also includes two custom skyboxes and music tracks as well as the map sources.

name: The Mapwich
description: The Mapwich is a collaborative megawad for Doom II, first released on June 2019. The project was led by Bridgeburner56 and based around the idea of pairing up mappers for each of the levels in the set, but also having the pairs be randomly chosen: the result was a total of 30 mappers, for 15 regular maps + 1 hub map. Each mapper was given free reign on what to build and what settings to utilize, the only rules being that the project had to be tested in GZDoom and that only a handful of liquid fall textures and new skies would be used as far as new graphics go, with everything else being stock Doom 1 and Doom 2 assets.

name: Guess the Movie: Quiz Game
description:
Do you remember posters of your favorite movies? Will you guess what the film is in front of you by the actors on the poster? Will you remember the name of the cartoon character on the image?

This quiz is a real catch for any cinephile! 750 movies, cartoons and TV series, 50 interesting levels, classic movies and current movies of different genres and countries of production — all are in one application.

name: Guessmoji
description: The game creator chooses the emoji categories, the grid size, the score to win and the lives of each players.

name: Tamagotchi Meets: Sanrio Characters ver.
description: The Tamagotchi Meets: Sanrio Characters version was released in Japan in June 2019. It features most of the m!xable Sanrio characters from the Sanrio m!x, in addition to several new additions such as Kuromi and Keroppi, and several exclusive locations such as the Strawberry Kingdom and Mariland.

name: Sweet Dream
description: Sweet Dream is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3. You play as Shurui Shian, a boy who is trying to find happiness through his dreams.

name: Sunlit
description:
Sunlit is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3.

Play as a young woman named Clover, explore her dream world, and find effects.

name: June 30th
description:
Welcome to Hotel Paradise! The view may be average, but the beds are so comfy, you'll never want to leave. What's more, there's a rumor: some say if you collect a lot of souvenirs, your wish will be granted. Are you up to the challenge?

Created for the 3rd Dream Diary Jam.

name: Caution
description:
A small project for the Dream Diary Jam #3. You play as Chui, who's trying to complete an essay while sleep deprived. The main goal is to explore and collect effects and items. There is also a collectible currency called Muns, which can be used to purchase items in the dream world.

There are two bars displayed on the top-left corner of the screen: ZZZ's; which act as a life bar for the player character that depletes when the player runs into a hazard in the dream world, and PRG which represents how much of the essays been written and increases each time the player works at the table.

name: Ep3
description: Ep3 is a Yume Nikki fangame which retains roughly the same gameplay formula but with a own twist on it. Ep3 was originally made for the Dream Diary Jam 3.

name: Divine
description:
di^ine is a Yume Nikki fangame made in RPGMaker 2003 for the 2019 Dream Diary Jam.

Fall asleep to see through Astrum's eyes and wander through her vision.

name: Portobello Beat
description: Portobello Beat is an indie rhythm boxing game where you play as Shiitake, a young mushroom boxer that must dodge and punch to the rhythm of the song in order to beat Deathcap, the reigning mushroom boxing champion.

name: Yume Kart
description: A cancelled Yume Nikki kart racer fan game. A few early versions were released, but were taken offline.

name: Meridian 157: Prologue
description: Meridian 157: Prologue is the first in a series of point-and-click puzzle adventure games. Play as David Zander, a meteorologist who is investigating a mysterious weather signal on a remote island south of Alaska. Venture toward the remote island to discover the mystery behind the 157th meridian!

name: My Nurse Girlfriend
description:
You're the star player on your school's soccer team, but an accident during a practice match sends you to the hospital with a broken leg. Seems like a real bummer until you find out you're in the hospital well-known amongst your friends for having THE hottest nurses in town! Not only do two beautiful nurses become a part of your daily life, but you also befriend a cute fellow patient that's been in the hospital for a while!
Maybe breaking your leg wasn't that bad of a thing at all!

name: I Cannot Drown
description: Created for Dream Diary Jam 3 and updated for later jams, I Cannot Drown is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame with 11 available effects as of Version 1.01

name: O2Jam
description:
Enjoy the classic rhythm game for everyone!
Enjoy 'O2Jam' on your own personalized play screen. Don't miss out the fun changing appearances of each skin type as you level up 'Fever' stages. With 100 songs and over 500 with subscription you can as much as you want, anywhere, anytime, such as the bus, subway, or even on the airplane.

name: Interview
description: They're waiting for you.

name: Tell Word
description:
Meet "Tell Word"! This is a new card game with simple rules that will appeal to children and adults. The aim of the game is to find an appropriate words before the rest players did it. Hurry up, call your friends and dive into the fun atmosphere of the game!
More about the game The game consists of the Task cards and the Letter cards. First the task is selected, then the letter is opened. Players try to find an appropriate word to the current task, and the one who first say the word gets a winning score. At the end of the game the player with the most points wins.

name: Basketball Club Story
description: Make your very own world-class basketball team! Specialize in one skill? Be a jack-of-all-trades? Or something in between? Create your own basketball team, recruit a cast of zany players, and compete against other teams. It's up to YOU to coach them to victory! Plus, build facilities for your clubhouse for your players and visitors to enjoy. Mix, match, and position them however you like! Sign with sponsors to gain impressive monetary support. Foster them alongside the rest of your team for even more rewards! Don't forget to connect with your local fans through community outreach. The more they learn about basketball, the more passionate they'll become! With the help of your players, sponsors, and spectators, you'll create the world's best basketball team! Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games!!

name: You-Realm
description: A college student named Spencer must explore a digital world in You-Realm, a Yume Nikki fan game made for Dream Diary Jam 3.

name: Goopty Goo
description: Stomp goop cubes and avoid the floor.

name: Zorbus
description: Zorbus is a fantasy-themed, graphical, turn-based, role-playing roguelike game. Your goal is to delve deep into a dungeon, find a portal to a mythical place called the Zorbus where a mere mortal can ascend to demigodhood.

name: A maze in Citadel
description: A maze in Citadel is a subtle blend of action and exploration with a touch of infiltration. Evolve in fully 3D environments with simple and effective gameplay. Monsters, traps, enigmas... Will you dare to face the citadel?

name: Don't Go into the Woods
description: A 10 year old boy, lost in the woods, must rescue his sister and find his way home. Explore, survive, and craft tools to help navigate the woods, help the local creatures, and find a way to escape the woods before you lose your mind.

name: Snowrifters VEX
description: This is a Virtual Vehicle Exhibition in a museum like environment where you can teleport around and look at the models. A Showcase Room for the vehicles, some props and weapons from the race game Snowrifters. Get an impression of the unique design from Timon Sager.

name: Sengoku Basara Battle Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Ring the City
description: In Ring the City, you use rings to fight. Charge the rings and cast powerful magic. Choose your rings wisely and build your own ring squad. Collect powerful rings and discover the truth of the world!

name: Investi-Gator: The Case of the Big Crime
description: A short comedy adventure. Investi-Gator is here to solve the crimes! He's not really clear on what the crime is, but he'll do his best. And as long as his brother Insti-Gator is around, he'll ALWAYS have someone to trust!

name: fullybroKen#4
description:
fullybroKen#4 puts you in the shoes of a genetically engineered human in a country ravaged by a constant war between three factions.

Combat in a match-3 fashion, help the war efforts of the one of the three factions, choose the destiny of Mir, choose your own destiny and learn unique spells in which each of them has unique properties

name: Sword Art Online Arcade: Deep Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Diffusion
description: Sin descripción

name: Is This Undertale
description: A short Yume Nikki/Undertale fan-game made for Dream Diary Jam.

name: Calling of my Nightingales
description: A Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 3. Tristan is stuck in his room for unknown reasons. In his dream world he can meet individuals known as Nightingales.

name: Yume Mienai: Pocket Version
description:
Yume Mienai is a GameBoy-style Yume Nikki Fangame made by Annie-Mienai in RPG Maker VX Ace in 2019. The first version was made for Dream Diary Jam 3.

Like Yume Nikki, you can sleep, explore, and get effects, but with the difference that there are RPG-style battles and dialogues.

name: Groaning Steel
description: A horror racing game.

name: The Sinking City: Worshippers of the Necronomicon
description: Keep the adventure going with this pack of 3 brand-new quests in which Charles Reed investigates unsolved cases and sets out in search of mysterious spell books that harbour unspeakable powers.

name: DriftKing 2D
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Hidden Side
description: Hidden Side invites kids to join a fearless team of ghost hunters, who dare see the unseen and help turn a haunted world back to normal, one ghost at a time. This new theme includes a series of “haunted” building sets full of awesome functionality and secret surprises that, on their own, provide the build and roleplay fun of any LEGO theme. Activating the free augmented reality app brings the models to life, revealing a hidden world of interactive mysteries and challenges to solve. When combined, the two worlds make each other even more compelling and fun. The app also consists of a digital game that kids can play independent of the building set.

name: Red Square
description:
"A Yume Nikki Fan Game for the Nintendo Virtual Boy, with programming by Kresna and graphics by Nyrator. A submission created in six weeks for the 2019 Dream Diary Jam.

Play as Nina and explore her dreams, collecting various effects along the way. The ending will become available once Nina has collected all four effects.

This game is written entirely in NEC V810 assembly and is made to be compatible with actual Virtual Boy hardware. Hardware compatibility has been tested by a third party.

The game doesn't feature any sound, as there was not enough time to write an assembly sound driver during the Jam. There is also no saving in the game itself."

name: Just Sleep - Meditate, Focus, Relax
description: Sleep tonight with soothing sounds and calm weather and nature effects. Take a break from hardcore gaming, winning multiplayer matches, hunting achievements and relax in front of your computer.

name: Battle Droid T1
description: Terminate an alien underground base on Mars using the T1 Battle Droid in old school metroidvania style .

name: Glad Valakas: Cyberban
description: Glad Valakas: a game in a shooter genre with RPG elements and nonlinear plot.

name: Great Wall March
description: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Tohou Sky Arena: Matsuri Climax - Playable Character: Yuyuko Saigyouji
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmic Dream
description: Cosmic Dream is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 3. The game features two playable characters: Astynomia and Timoria. The player's goal is to explore and collect Data (effects).

name: Fortnite: Shadows Rising Pack
description:
Eclipse the competition this season while wearing the Shadows Rising pack! Includes the following cosmetics:

- Shadow Skully Outfit
- Stark Satchel Back Bling
- Shadowbird Outfit
- Shadowbird Wings Back Bling
- Perfect Shadow Outfit
- Perfect Wings Back Bling
- Array Wrap

name: Rem
description: Rem is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for the Dream Diary Jam 3. Explore the dreams of Juke as you find effects and events. In addition to effects, the player can also collect little orbs scattered around the various dream worlds and unlock wallpapers for the computer.

name: Reach
description:
Reach is a short English fangame created as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 3, about an adult named Sewa who's moving away with their friends.

Gameplay focuses on exploration and effect finding. Alongside effects, the player must also find the protagonist's friends within the Otherworld and escort them to the Nexus. The player can also find cassette tapes which can be listened to using the cassette player in the bedroom, revealing little bits of the game's backstory.
The protagonist has a health bar that will deplete if they are caught by chasers.

name: Tsuki no Kanata de Aimashou
description: This is a visual novel about the feeling of first love, the bittersweet memories of our high school lives, a regret-filled summer.

name: Final Orbit 2
description:
Final Orbit 2 - The end-of-the-world, sci-fi, arcade shooter. 
You play as Earth's last line of defence, a lone weaponized satellite, fighting hard against the barrage of space debris. As a last resort, the united governments of Earth have decided to evacuate the planet- but how many can you save?

name: Catgirl Lover
description: Flashy and juicy anime girls are waiting for you! Yes, you! Join the Golden Shower Order and undress 'em all! A simple but fascinating game with a mixture of Visual Novel and Match3. Easy to dig in and impossible to resist.

name: F1 2019: Legends Edition
description: Fans who purchase the ‘F1 2019 Legends Edition’ will get to drive as Ayrton Senna in his 1990 McLaren MP4/5B and Alain Prost in the Ferrari F1-90, face-off over eight race challenges, and receive exclusive Senna and Prost themed multiplayer car liveries. The drivers’ likenesses have also been added to the Career mode which players can experience when this edition is launched with three days early access on June 25th 2019 on PlayStation4 computer entertainment system, the Xbox One family of devices including the Xbox One X and Windows PC (DVD and via Steam).

name: Heroic: Magic Duel
description:
An intense strategy-driven PvP battle game for thrill-seekers and competitive types—the kind of people who roar “Bring it on!” in the face of a serious challenge.

Battle your way through Heroic Arenas. Master a variety of Heroes, each with their own unique skills and traits. Collect, upgrade and evolve powerful Spells and Minions, build a Deck to match your playstyle and climb your way up the Leaderboards as you crush one enemy Portal after another…. all the way to the Legendary Arena!

name: Please Find Me
description: Michael, an ordinary clerk went on a camping trip and got into trouble. During the trip in the forest a heavy rain began and he had to shelter in a cave, what happens next will depend on your choice.

name: The Last Escape of Yeti
description: Yeti living in the forests of Karelia was kidnapped by the evil oligarch Ivan Ivanov.... Now he has to win in an unequal battle local mafia and corrupt police officers. To do this, he needs to go through the streets of the city filled with dangers.

name: On Your Mark
description: There is a hidden power in a thousand-year-old temple. If you stray into the temple, you will encounter all kinds of strange and inconceivable monsters. You pick up your weapons and fight for the enemy until you meet the legendary dragon from the east...

name: Reverse Me! Rez/Ru
description: The first of the "Reverse me!" trilogy. Inspired by the fairy tale of "Little Red Riding Hood", Reverse Me! Rez/Ru is the sad story of a friendship, a tragedy, and a quest to undo the disaster.

name: DrumMasterVR
description: Enter the virtual world, experience the joy of hitting jazz drums with drumsticks, and wave your hands to play the rhythm that belongs to you.

name: Interregnum
description: Your people need you.Take your sword and serve your country !

name: Dancing Girl
description:
This is a casual game with novel gameplay, sexy girls, dynamic music and hot dance.

Game-play: Throw rubber balls at sexy hot dancing girl

Features:

- Realistic style of the picture has strong sense of substitution
- Novelty and Unique Play
- Cute, sexy girl
- Exquisite hot dance
- Dynamic music

name: Fruit Postal Service
description: Fruit Postal Service is a package-delivery, battle-racing game where you play as members of the Fruit Postal Service: Walter Melon, Bandana-nana, Jack Apple, and more! Use your unique fruity abilities to deliver the most fruit to your customers and become employee of the month!

name: Attract Fragments 5
description: In order to build the strongest soldier, clone training begins today

name: SlipSlop
description: One button platformer nightmare

name: Furusato wo Sagasu Sanshimai
description: This is an experimentation of recreating the dream, much more than a game. You can stroll in the world which the creator has actually dreamed. Your dream can proceed with guidance written on the button for the destination.

name: Diamonds
description: 3rd Person Shooter. Assault Rifle, Shotgun and Grenades. Collect Diamonds scattered around the map, with unlimited ammo engage in intriguing battles, beat the enemy and collect their diamonds. Use the Diamonds to continue your journey unlocking maps and setting high scores.

name: Spell Casting: Purrfectly Portable Edition
description: Spell Casting is a line drawing puzzle game in which you are a young wizard learning spells in the comfort of your home thanks to Wizardly Distance Education offered by the prestigious Magical Education Of Wizards School!

name: Rally Rock 'N Racing
description: In Rally Rock 'N Racing, you'll enjoy a wide variety of natural environments, such as deserts, snow-covered mountains, forests... where you can show your skill at the wheel, competing against everyone to become the fastest. The game has several modes, such as Championship, Time Trial, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer. Online leader board where you can compare your best times with those of your friends and players from around the world.

name: Crazy Beat's Junction
description: Crazy Beat's Junction is Rhythm Action Game.Press buttons and move cars on the road to the goal.Make the best traffic control.

name: Matter of the Dreams
description: Matter of the Dreams - is a game for die-hard action fans. No exploration, no searching for keys to unlock paths – the player needs nothing more than good aim and a quick trigger finger to succeed.

name: Real Drift Racing
description: Time to unleash the demon of speed! Drifting, speed and competition - all in one game! Get ready to drive on high performance cars and make them drift at lightning speed on realistic tracks. Improve your racing and drifting skills as you earn cash to buy new cars! Tune and customize your cars and become the best driver in the world! It's time to buckle up and step on the gas!

name: Galaxicus
description: The Galaxicus MMO is equal parts space exploration, space combat, and planetary and empire building. The universe resets every four weeks, making it possible for all levels of players to play and succeed across successive campaigns.

name: Rune Girl
description: This is a "leisure" game with a fine style and a mysterious world following the plot. In this world, there will be a variety of girls, cute cats who have lost their way, and docile maids who have done something wrong. Slavery your evil little witch, what choices should you make in the face of their challenges?

name: Hand to Hand Combat
description: Break down doors, point your fingers, clear the room and survive in Hand to Hand Combat; A Virtual Reality Action game for Valve Index Controllers!! Slow Motion, Physics, Secret Agents!

name: Storm Chasers
description: Be one of those intrepid storm chasers in this online multiplayer video game. Your goal is to shoot the best twisters pictures without dying because of powerful winds and flying debris. Feel the challenge of correctly forecasting and intercepting storms with the optimal vantage points before other players.

name: F1 2019
description: Working in partnership with F1, for the first time ever, players will be able to get behind the wheel of a 2019 regulation car specifically designed in collaboration with F1’s technical team, headed up by Ross Brawn and Pat Symonds. The car, which will be available in Multiplayer, adheres to the 2019 regulations and comes with a range of livery designs offering players a new level of personalization. The 2019 F1 Team liveries will also feature on the car in early marketing materials, but will be replaced by the final Team cars ahead of the game's release.

name: Super Mario Maker 2
description: A side-scrolling Mario adventure that unleashes the creative potential of Super Mario Maker 2 awaits in Story Mode, which contains over 100 built-in courses. And in Course Maker, a wide range of parts, tools, and more are available so you can construct your own courses. Want coin-shooting cannons? Bowser riding on a giant Goomba? Cat Mario sliding down slopes to take out an army of baddies? Go for it! You call the shots. Pass a Joy-Con controller to a partner to build co-operatively on a single system!

name: Zombie Deathrace Feeding Frenzy
description: Zombie Deathrace Feeding Frenzy is the first competitive VR aquarium style game, available on PC and Android. Play against your friends on dedicated servers, or play against the single player computer generated AI and progress through the game levels and get the high score.

name: Gravity Vector
description: Gravity Vector is a challenging game where the player's main objective is to reach a target wormhole aboard a capsule, while facing different obstacles such as planets' gravitational pull, hostile entities, asteroids and more.

name: #SkiJump
description: #SkiJump - jump like a unicorn in VR! Ski the slopes like a pro and jump higher that you would ever be capable of IRL. Beat your friends in slalom, racing and/or punching villagers (or other players) and/or jumping. #SkiJump has it all (including snow balls).

name: Arcade Archives: Clu Clu Land
description: Arcade Archives: Clu Clu Land is port of the action game Clu Clu Land. Control the main character, Gloopy, to find hidden gold ingots hidden around the stage. Gloopy automatically moves forward, but by holding and releasing the turn posts at the right time, you can send Gloopy off in different directions. You are also able to enjoy playing together in coop mode.

name: Mystery Masterpiece: The Moonstone
description: In this thrilling hidden object whodunnit... an ancient and priceless piece of jewelry, the "Moonstone", has been stolen, and it`s up to you to track it down! Investigate every person who was in the mansion at the time of the crime to solve the mystery and catch the crook!

name: Crossout: Horsemen of Apocalypse - Famine
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sinking City: Investigator Pack
description: Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit, permanent access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.

name: Super Robot Taisen T: Expansion Pack
description: A few months after the end of Daybreak War which shook the Solar System. In this new Golden Age, a world filled with hope lies an immense catastrophe that is beginning to emerge from its shadows...

name: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - Devote
description: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - Devote is a port of Clock Zero for Nintendo Switch. It adds new content set in the time the characters attend middle school.

name: Sairento VR: Untethered
description: Ever wanted to be a cyber ninja? A top-selling VR game and probably the best cyber ninja simulator ever, Sairento VR offers you that opportunity! Perform quadruple jumps, wall runs, power slides, back flips and even get to manipulate time. Empty lead into an enemy before spinning around to sink your blade into another. Kit yourself with katanas, firearms, bows, throwing glaives, shurikens, kunais and more - they are all at your disposal. Keep growing your experience and upgrading your skills.

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: New Japan Pro-Wrestling 2018 Wrestler Pack
description: Usher in a new era to the Fire Pro ring with additional New Japan Pro-Wrestling talent!

name: Pinball Breaker 3
description: Pinball Breaker 3 is a breakout game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional breakout game and a flipper game. Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.

name: HubWorld
description: A relaxing first-person exploration game with a focus on visual design, novelty, and ease of use.

name: Young Wife Elf's Netorase RPG: Irena
description: Sin descripción

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukensha-tachi!
description: Konosuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World! Labyrinth of Hope and the Gathering Adventurers is a Japanese dungeon RPG adventure game. It takes place after the crisis in Alcanretia. Kazuma and friends return to their mundane hikikomori lifestyle....that is until Aqua picked up a mysterious glass piece. They took it to Vanir's appraisal for assurance where they learn it is a magic stone piece with immense power and worth... 10,000,000 Eris!!

name: Mr. Joshua Carrot
description: Mr Joshua Carrot" является уникальным 2D платформером с головоломками и уникальными авторскими рисунками в стиле граффити.

name: Mission B
description: Mission B is the combination of arkanoid and first person shooter, built in the Virtual Reality to offer the new level of immersion and unique gaming experience for all arkanoid and shooters fans.

name: Riflestorm
description: Control a squad of elite soldiers to defend the world against an invading insurgent threat. Each mission attempt creates a new randomly generated challenge in this turn-based strategy game.

name: CyberGlide VR
description: First real heir of defrag genre in virtual reality

name: Dobutsu Shogi World
description: Master Shogi easily with this game! Let’s play and learn Shogi on three levels! Dobutsu Shogi (Age: 4+) A game played on a 3×4 square board with eight animal pieces. Cute animal pieces have marks to show the direction of movement. Easy rules. Have fun learning basic Shogi! Goro-Goro Dobutsu Shogi (Age: 5+) A game played on a 5×6 square board with 16 animal pieces. An advanced Dobutsu Shogi game. The perfect way to learn and increase your skill in moving Dog (Gold) and Cat (Silver) that are important pieces for protecting King and for checkmating. Dobutsu Shogi in the Greenwood (Age: 6+) A game played on a 9×9 square board with 40 animal pieces. A board game with the same rules as Shogi. Piece movement and other basic rules are the same as Dobutsu Shogi and Goro-Goro Dobutsu Shogi. Use all that you learned and start playing Shogi.

name: The World is Your Weapon
description: Wells, pitfalls, houses, villagers, monsters (!?), anything around you can be a weapon! An action RPG that you've never seen before, you can fight with all the objects you see in the game. There are more than 300 kinds of weapons.Aim to complete the weapon gallery!

name: Kyle Simulator
description: Welcome to Kyle Simulator, where you can experience a realistic simulation of an everyday Kyle. Your goals are defined. Mutant Energy & Walls. You know what to do.

name: Baff 2
description: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

name: Bepuzzled Animals Jigsaw Puzzle
description: 103 Puzzles – what great value! This game showcases a wide variety of animals and is great for animal lovers! User friendly User Interface 'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier Calming music What more do you need and at such great value!

name: Box Labyrinth
description: Solve environmental puzzles by pushing boxes around, making bridges, pushing buttons, and riding conveyor belts. In certain stages, you will be given a partner, and you can switch control between you and your partner at any time.

name: Rain City
description:
Players control the main character to look for his sister in the city. The story moves along while meeting various characters, gathering information, solving puzzles, and clearing minigames. There are elements that test skills including memory and observation, and the many items that appear add to its appeal to the game.

The picture book-like graphics and story about animals who live like humans will draw you in to the world of Rain City.

name: Mose Three Kingdoms
description: Sin descripción

name: World's Nicht
description: World's Nicht is a casual indie platformer designed with short levels (on average it will take 5-10 minutes per stage to clear with a total of 20 stages).

name: Fort Boyard
description: Ever wanted to experience the Fort Boyard adventure with your friends? You will soon be able to make that dream a reality: set off on the journey together, from the comfort of your couch, in just a few weeks’ time! In single or multiplayer mode (up to 4 players), solve Sir Fouras’ tricky riddles, follow Passe-Partout through the mazes of the fort and take up the challenges to get the keys that will allow you to enter the treasure room.

name: Unbroken Soul
description: Unbroken Soul is a retro-style action platformer game. Run, jump and slash your way through the huge world of Alaron!

name: ZorroMoro
description: Enjoyable FPS Game, infinite stages doesnt over ZorroMoro. Different weapon types, different tactics. The biggest problem probably bullet. You have to fix it. Down the enemies. Enemies can come everywhere.

name: Shogun's Empire: Hex Commander
description: Lead your clan, build an army, wage wars — become Shogun and rule over Japan. Shogun’s Empire: Hex Commander is a turn-based strategy game with multi-layered gameplay mechanics.

name: Valley of Decay
description: Valley of Decay is a 2D pixel-art multi-player Hack and Slash game. Trade from self-found items extracted essences at the auction house. Craft your own items with those essences. There are no limits, no highest level, no strongest item. You can always become stronger.

name: Tour de France 2019
description: This is the video game of "Le Tour de Franc", the iconic and most popular cycling race in the world.

name: Goonya Fighter
description:
A floppy kind of party fighting game! Up to 4 people can flop about until you can flop no more. Ready to become a Goonya Fighter?

Walk too far and you flop over; punch the wrong way and be sent flying!
And get back up again just as easily!

For beginners and pros alike, welcome to a different kind of fighting game.

name: Chiki-Chiki Boxy Pro Wrestling
description:
Voxel wrestlers intensely and furiously slamming into each other!Enjoy the fun, over the top moves that this game has to offer!

The battle gong sounds! Make your way through the tournament, aiming for the top!

The controls are easy! You can bust out flashy moves with just a single button.

Unleash jump attacks, drops, holds, and specials, carrying them out just how you think of them!

Up to 6 players can play. Compete in intense battles with players from all around the world!

Combine your favorite parts and moves to create your very own custom wrestler!

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2019
description: Manage your own team of professional cyclists in the new 2019 season. Take the lead in over 200 races and 600 stages around the world and try to win legendary races like La Vuelta and the Tour de France.

name: Death Inn
description: A group of people who didn't know each other found a dead body in a haunted house called 【Death Inn】. And when this group of people returned to the lobby again, ready to leave the place,The door has was no longer there......

name: Fujii
description: A serene, mystical journey that traverses a series of otherworldly, organic landscapes, Fujii is a respite for weary travelers. The experience flows between outdoor exploration and creative gardening, merging aspects of adventure and cultivation into a refreshing, musically enveloping whole.

name: The Sinking City: Necronomicon Edition
description:
The Sinking City is an adventure and investigation game set in an open world inspired by the universe of H.P. Lovecraft, the master of Horror. The half-submerged city of Oakmont is gripped by supernatural forces. You're a private investigator, and you have to uncover the truth of what has possessed the city... and the minds of its inhabitants.

The Sinking City: Necronomicon Edition which includes:
- The Sinking City - Standard Edition
- The Worshipers of the Necronomicon DLC: 3 side quests with the infamous Necronomicon and new monsters
- The Investigator Pack DLC: the Private Investigator outfit, First Aid Kits, Antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.

name: Penn and Teller VR: Frankly Unfair, Unkind, Unnecessary & Underhanded
description: Legendary entertainers Penn & Teller bring their unique brand of magical mayhem to a virtual stage! Penn & Teller VR: F U, U, U, & U is a virtual torturous toy box of frankly unfair, unkind, unnecessary, and underhanded magic tricks and simulations that will absolutely baffle and humiliate your friends.

name: Jikkyou Pawafuru Puroyakyu
description: The Switch title will use the latest data from the 2019 baseball season, and include game modes such as “Pennant” (choose your favorite baseball team and try to become the best in Japan), “Treasure” (bring up the strongest team), and “Home Run Attack” (a single-player mode where you shoot for the high score). It will also support competitive and cooperative multiplayer for up to four players.

name: Trysaria
description: The game's story will invite you to explore the sprawling and mysterious eponymous world of Trysaria where you will battle fierce and deadly monsters for rare treasures and lend a hand to the struggling citizens of the vibrant cities and plains across the world.

name: To All of Mankind
description: Set in Tokyo's Akihabara, an adventure game where a group of cheerful ladies enjoys a survival life with each other's company. Five girls in Akihabara abandoned for a long time. Without having anyone else around, they must be friendly and help each other while living happy days. In all times, they are honest and cheerful regardless of any situation. Be it from cooking together to bathing, relaxation, and all occasions to enjoy themselves to the fullest.

name: The Walking Zombie 2
description: The world after the zombie apocalypse is a grim place. You were born into it, so you will have to struggle to survive and fight against many kinds of zombies, bandits and dangerous boss monsters. You will go on important story quests and many side quests, level up your skills and perks, sell and buy equipment, and communicate with the (un)lucky survivors in our free mobile FPS/RPG.

name: Sega Ages: Space Harrier
description:
Goal: Destroy all enemies. Harrier is in a constant state of motion as he traverses the Fantasy Zone. Can he eliminate all evil, supernatural beasts in order to save Dragon Land? Use your jet laser cannon to shoot while dodging obstacles. Can you beat all stages and reach the end? Play Sega Ages Space Harrier today!

The Switch Port is based on the arcade release with options for arcade style side panels on screen, a CRT display.
There is also an option to use the Joy-con like an arcade joystick, holding it vertically and tilting it for movement.

It includes the widescreen support and additional boss from the 3DS version of the game.
It also adds a new game mode where a support character protects the player from damage with barriers, though they get disabled for a time if the support character is attacked.

name: The Indie Game Legend 3D
description: Explore a mysterious alien base, blast vicious alien inhabitants, and rescue indie game developers in this NES inspired first-person shooter-vania!

name: Dogfighter: World War 2
description: A dogfighting game set in the skies of World War II featuring the famous fighter planes of the time, including the Zero fighter plane, Mustang, Spitfire, Messerschmitt, and more! Become a pilot of World War II and experience historic dogfights in the Scenario Mode. Compete in 40-player battles with options to play solo, a duo (two-person team), or in a squad (three-person team) inBattle Royale Mode.

name: Void Tyrant
description: The galaxy is in disarray and great danger in this hybrid card and RPG. Choose your hero from one of several different powerful classes and search distant planets. Combat is more than just who has the higher stats or fancier weapons. You'll need to carefully consider your options and plan throughout each encounter, since only the person who wins the round gets to deal damage. You and your opponent take turns laying down numbered cards, choosing wether to hit or stand, in an effort to get as close to a value of 12 without going over. You'll also be able to play unique skills or items that can modify the value of your opponent's hand or your own, cast spells or wield attacks, and more. You may even be joined by allies who add their own special cards to your deck.

name: The Sinking City
description:
The Sinking City is a game of investigation genre taking place in a fictional open world inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft.
The player incarnates a private investigator in 1920s, who finds himself in a city of New England, Oakmont Massachusetts. It's currently suffering from extensive waterflood, and its cause is clearly supernatural.

name: Sunkissed
description: Sunkissed is the first and only book of the Sunkissed series.

name: Darius Maker
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sinking City: Chicago Organ Grinder
description:
Style or power? Now you can have both with the Chicago Organ Grinder, the favourite weapon of 1920s gangsters.

This DLC grants early access to the most powerful weapon in the game, the Tommy gun, and comes with a golden skin of the weapon.

name: Outbreak Ultimate Apocalypse
description: Enter the world of survival horror with the Outbreak Ultimate Apocalypse bundle! Featuring Outbreak: Lost Hope, Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles, Outbreak: The New Nightmare and Outbreak at a great price! Can you survive the nightmare?

name: Nonogram.com
description: Nonogram.com is an addictive picture cross puzzle with a vast collection of griddlers. Challenge your mind with this easy-to-play number puzzle from a top developer, and become a real Nonogram master! Join nonogram puzzle players all around the world, use logic to reveal pixel art pictures, and have fun!

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - The Tyrant's Bodyguard
description: ''The Tyrant's Bodyguard''' is an original ''maybe'' series. You play as Jin Park, a bodyguard-for-hire working at Guard One, the nation's top private security company. After a night out with his best friend leaves his life hopelessly entangled with the royal family, he finds that he must make a decision that will impact the rest of his life: swear his fealty to the royal family, or cling to the revenge that his parents desperately held unto. Will he be able to sort out where his loyalties lie?

name: The Mating Season
description: Donatello decides to admit to April that him and the rest of the Turtles have been jerking off to the news reports featuring April.

name: XSection
description: Put your perception of shape to the test! Can you identify which of the objects presented to you creates the outline on screen? Get ready for an all new brain exercise!

name: Magicami
description: A brand-new turn-based RPG game filled with sexy magical girls! Can you unravel the mysteries? Assist the beautiful Kamisaman in stopping the raging demons and helping to get a world engulfed in chaos back to order and harmony. Every choice you make will bring you one step closer to shaping a brighter future for all.

name: Anne Frank House VR
description:
In 1942, during the Second World War, Anne Frank, a thirteen-year-old Jewish girl and her family were forced to go into hiding to escape persecution from the Nazis. For more than two years, the Franks and 4 others would live in the “Secret Annex” of an old office building in Amsterdam, sharing the burden of living in hiding in confined quarters with the constant threat of discovery.

The award winning Anne Frank House VR offers a unique and emotional insight into these two years. Experience the world-famous Secret Annex in a never before seen way. Travel back to the years of the Second World War and wander through the rooms of the Annex that housed the group of 8 Jewish people as they hid from the Nazis. Immerse yourself in Anne’s thoughts as you traverse each faithfully recreated room, thanks to the power of VR, and find out what happened to the Annex’ brave inhabitants.

name: Blue
description:
Blue is a bontegames puzzle game and the sequel to the 'yellow', 'red' and 'black' games. Can you make the screen blue in 50 levels? Each level has its own logic.
Use the light bulb button that will appear after a while in the top right of each level to get a hint. There are multiple hints for each level.

name: Carbage
description: Carbage is a cute and easy-going, no-threshold, bumper car party for everyone. It's perfectly simple for children or inexperienced players, and offers some ridiculous stunts to master among mature gamers. Play on your couch, with your friends and family. Don't forget snacks.

name: Counterrealstic Syndrome γ
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Cherub
description:
This Little Cherub is a real brat and this time he’s gone too far... 
His boss decided it’s time to prove he’s worthy of paradise and sent him down to hell! 
Help him elevate himself back to paradise

name: Attack of the Toy Tanks
description: War is coming whether you’re ready for it or not soldier! In Attack of the Toy Tanks, across the game’s 60 levels in the main campaign, players must take control of the provided vehicle of war and battle it out across different arenas and be the last tank standing.

name: Teamfight Tactics
description: Teamfight Tactics is a round-based strategy game that pits you against seven opponents in a free-for-all race to build a powerful team that fights on your behalf. Your goal: Be the last person standing.

name: Lost Egg
description: The first of low-price series of Kimidorisoft! A hard action adventure game depicting raw egg ecstasy and bravery.Aim for a frying pan that rolls past various stages with awkward music.

name: Card Throw VR
description: Card Throw VR Is the only game that allows you to become a professional card thrower in a matter of seconds! Hop into the saloon right now and start your VR Card throwing journey...

name: Hrdina
description: The game is about a hero that goes from game to the real world. Levels are generated by the music which is provided by Czech band Zrní.

name: Real Man Got 100
description: It's a game of strategy & act & difficult, leisure and comedy. Perhaps in the near future, through painstaking practice You will become a real man!

name: BTS World
description:
The world turns upside down the moment you grab the ticket. When you open your eyes, you’re somewhere unfamiliar, back in the year 2012. Wait, you’re a BigHit employee? 
 
You've just become BTS's manager in a world where BTS doesn't even exist yet. Their debut is now in your hands!

name: C-War 2
description: C-War 2 is a cartoon-based multiplayer game. Capture flags and win the round for your team. Choose between different weapons and skins to decide the game for you.

name: Just Cause 4: Los Demonios
description: Los Demonios is the second DLC pack in the ‘Dare Devils, Demons and Danger' Expansion Pass, and it brings a totally new experience to JUST CAUSE 4,” said Bryan Rodriguez, Creative Producer at Avalanche Studios. “For the first time, Rico is tangling with an otherwordly threat that will push him to his limits. This is our chance to see if Rico is as good at squashing demons as he is at toppling dictators!

name: The Legends of Class One
description: One day, in a certain class of a technical school, an incident caused by the absence of class, the whole class was kidnapped by the teacher to a different world. But seven lucky ones escaped, and then they struggled with the teacher to save the class and return to the real world.

name: Neolithic Brave Man
description: Neolithic brave man is a JRPG game made by RPGmakerMV.

name: Foreign Frugglers
description: The Fruggle is real! Four brave survivors need to protect mother earth from spacey invaders in this pixelated arcade style 2d shoot 'm up.

name: Shadow Fencer Theatre
description: Shadow Fencer Theatre is a competitive awkward physics sword fighting game set in the world of shadow puppets.

name: Hardcore Mecha
description: A mech-themed 2D platformer. With action-packed shooting, highly polished animations, driving multiple unique awesome mechs to fly in the air, play your own style based on a fluent set of controls.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - ADF-01 FALKEN Set
description: The ADF-01 FALKEN Set contains the ADF-01 FALKEN aircraft, the Sol skin for the Su-30M2, and a set of bonus emblems.

name: Minecraft: Toy Story Mash-up
description: Open up the toy box! Woody, Buzz, Bo Peep and many of your favorite toys come to life in this oversized Mash-up based on all the Toy Story movies! To infinity and beyond!

name: Generation Zero: Bikes
description: You can now traverse the streets, forests, and coasts of Östertörn with a sparkling new bicycle, dodging machines as you go. Not only will you be able to cross greater distances more efficiently, but you will also be able to utilize these handy bikes as strategic tools to lure machines to your ambush location. Just remember, you are not immune to the spray of bullets or rockets that head your way once an enemy spots you.

name: The Girl With the Gray Hair Awakens
description: "A girl wakes up in a strange room, unsure of who she is... Play multiple times to uncover the full story!"

name: DOOM Remake 4
description: DR4 is a compilation pack of various mods and assets which aims to bring Classic Doom into the modern era. It replaces all 2D sprites to the 3D models, adds new high resolution textures, shaders/materials and some other stuff.

name: Cessabit
description: Inspect each illustration for clues, tap objects for hints and solve complicated objectives. Beautiful line art environments combined with calming nature sounds will create a zen atmosphere perfect for relaxing. Complete levels after finding the correct answers to a set of questions. There is no time limit to complete levels.

name: Moss: The Twilight Garden
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Tonight: One Love
description: King's Head Dave is done with all this Brexit malarkey, and has decided to pack up and move to France, in the hope of finding true love.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Yukon Valley
description: Referred to by some as "The Last Frontier" and "The Land of the Midnight Sun", it's hard to deny that Alaska is a place of untamed natural beauty. Under the watchful gaze and devoted care of warden Jim Murray, Yukon Valley has become a haven for knowledgeable hunters and ecologists, looking to maintain the delicate balance of the...

name: Real Time Battle Shogi Online
description:
Real Time Battle Shogi Online, which overturns the basic Shogi rule of "moving pieces alternately", now has an internet battle function!
Move as many pieces as you want at any given time, and the first player to capture the other player's ball as quickly as possible wins.
You can play against the best players in the country or battle with your friends.
This is the eSports of Shogi!

name: Please
description: In an alternate timeline where we won the war, you are the repair person. You fix things. You keep things running. You do what you're told. We asked you so nicely.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Shang Tsung
description:
"Soul Sorcerer and historic host of the Mortal Kombat. Born in Earthrealm, Shang Tsung's relentless pursuit of powerful magic led him to Outworld, where Shao Kahn offered him a dark power that no sorcerer on Earthrealm could. Shang Tsung pledged his eternal loyalty to Shao Kahn in exchange for this evil magic, but he is no faithful servant. He dreams of the day his sorcery will overtake Shao Kahn's, and he'll pay any price to get there."

Mortal Kombat 11: Kombat Pack owners had a week of early access to this DLC.

name: Craft the World: Abandoned Mines
description: The “Abandoned Mines” DLC will add new underground structures – abandoned mines – to all worlds.

name: Craft the World: Bosses & Monsters
description: Repel an invasion of pirates from a ghost ship, deal with the were-dwarves that appear during blood moons in winter, solve a Sphinx’s riddle, and defeat a Monster from the Depths of the subterranean world in the “Bosses and Monsters” DLC!

name: Cthulhu Virtual Pet 2
description:
Have you ever dreamt of raising a Lovecraftian God from infancy to glorious monsterhood? 
 
No matter if you are a fan of Lovecraft or you just read this name for the first time, this pixel art retro virtual pet game will be in your pocket to fill your days with fun. 
 
You will be a new student of the Miskatonic University, and your mission is to take care of the great old one Cthulhu ^(;,,;)^. 
 
Key features: 
 
- Feed, clean, destroy and make him sleep 
- 4 stages of evolution from infant to god 
- 5 different scenes depend of the day 
- 6 groups of food to satisfy his big stomach 
- Dress him up with 80+ pieces of T-shirt, pants, hats, wings and glasses 
- Invoke other Lovecraftian monsters and receive special gifts 
- Play mini games to gain souls for his daily routine 
- Accomplish missions to collect seals and golden skulls 
- Name your own Cthulhu and his witnesses 
- Optional retro filter for your nostalgia 
- Cloud save keeps your progress in sync on your different devices 
 
Wake up the sleeping Cthulhu and help him to resume his rule of earth!

name: Hitman 2: New York
description:
New York City is the most populous city in the United States of America, located in the state of New York. A thriving metropolis, it is home to many famous landmarks as well as Providence associates.
The mission Golden Handshake takes place in the city, located exclusively inside the Milton-Fitzpatrick bank. 47 must eliminate Athena Savalas and acquire a Providence data core from the bank's heavily-protected vault.
This is the first expansion included in the expansion pass.

name: Magnetic Daydream
description: Magnetic Daydream is a first person puzzle game. Players must solve physics-based puzzles by manipulating the polarity of the magnetized objects and direction of gravitational force. Overcoming the challenges, players will experience hours of unique game play.

name: Peep
description:
A minimalistic but hardcore scifi platformer where you play as a robot trainee. 
 
Robot training program is a set of puzzles and difficult obstacles through which you need to complete for a certain time. The main difficulty is that the world is invisible to the robot and shown only for a small period when the scan ability is activated. 
 
Futuristic laconic levels will seem simple, but it is worth remembering that each surrounding object is hostile for a small fragile robot. Your main enemies will be time and a limited number of charges. Your friends are reaction, calculation and sense of time. 
 
Each level will require you to carefully study the new difficulties. You will be able to pass through the portal only by learning on your mistakes, looking for a safe way to avoid the obstacles and solve puzzles on a given time. 
 
 
If it seems to you that there are few difficulties, try to pass each level into three stars!

name: Aperture Hand Lab
description:
These Aren't Your Daddy's Hands.

These aren't even your hands. These are precision-tuned sensor-rich re-imaginings of your hands, presented in high-fidelity simulated reality.

If you've always longed to try these exciting edge-of-your-wrist hand maneuvers, but wanted the chance to practice first in the safety of a non-judgmental virtual world, Aperture Hand Lab is easily in the top three options currently available to you in VR.

name: Qwerty's Prison
description: Qwerty's Prsion is used keyboard action game. Evade Enermy, Avoid Trap, Explore World, Escape Keyboard. Player required accurate control with your keyboard Challenge it, Adjust it, New manipulation Good Luck!

name: PuzzleTales: Svalbard
description:
You are about to embark on a unique puzzle solving experience with Svalbard, a sci-fi short story by Lavie Tidhar. Travel along with Mai as she explores a utopian post-apocalyptic world and discovers ancient time vaults, forgotten robot enclaves and slumbering super computers. Help her scavenge for old technology in the ruined cities and discover ancient secrets about previous civilizations. Between chapters of the story, you will encounter a variety of different puzzles that you must solve to unlock the next chapter. There are multiple paths through this non-linear story, and many secrets to discover as you play along.

Do you have the mental fortitude necessary to conquer all 40+ puzzles and unlock the entire story?

name: Bepuzzled Space Jigsaw Puzzle
description: 108 Space puzzles to complete! Interesting space rockets, space suits and celestial bodies. Challenge yourself with the timer and resist the urge to use hints. Friendly User Interface for easy selection and 'magnetic' pieces for convenience. Calming music, which can be muted.

name: Virtual Debating Chamber
description: New Zealand Parliament’s Virtual Debating Chamber (VDC) is a Virtual Reality experience that takes you on a guided exploration of the heart of New Zealand's legislature. It is captured through Photogrammetry and 3D scanning for an immersive and interactive experience.

name: The Panel DC
description: The Panel DC is a puzzle game where you will turn valves, pull levers and push buttons. Start interacting with the panel elements and found the combinations to make it work. Then you can make it out of the room you get locked in.

name: Hexelectric
description: Become a space mechanic and repair the broken panels. "Hexelectric" needs your excellent insight and intelligence.

name: Parking 3D
description: Parking 3D is an amazing car parking simulator where you have to park different cars with highest precision!

name: Mahjong: Magic Chips
description: Mahjong: Magic Chips is a sweet board game where you have to destroy all the same tiles as soon as possible!

name: Snow Arena
description: Snow Arena is a multiplayer fps hide and seek game. If you successfully hide, you may be the first in the game. A great game where you can make snowball fight all season.

name: Akash: Path of the Five
description:
Akash: Path of the Five is a professionally-produced, fully voiced otome visual novel.

Players will become Aurora, a member of a magical race of elementals. As the first elemental girl the village has seen in over 200 years, all eyes are on her fast-approaching coming of age ceremony. All is not as it seems, however, as tensions between Akash and a nearby human settlement threaten to erupt into an all-out war. Cultivate a romance with one of her five classmates, navigate the coming conflict, and plan the greatest coming of age ceremony Akash has seen in over two centuries.

name: Eidolon adventure
description: This is a casual hang - up game, in the game you can defeat the eidolon to make your eidolons more powerful.

name: Chaos Dream: Retribution
description: Join young Grigori on a mission of discovery, betrayal and honor. Travel through forests, swamps and deserts in search of truth and peace.

name: It Stares Back
description: Explore The Great Tapestry: Once a candy-colored realm of dreams and fantasy, now a corrupted death-scape of perilous ruin. Will you gaze into the void to learn the fate of this tattered land? Be weary, traveler…

name: Pact With a Witch
description: Hoping to save your childhood friend from a lifetime transformed into a woman, you have agreed to have 3 dates with the witch who punished him for trying to rape her.She seems honest and open, but you sense something sinister about her..

name: Jormungandr
description: You are the serpent Jormungandr, middle child of Loki. After being cast into the oceans of Midgard, you must grow to encircle the land and catch your own tail to fulfill the prophecy of Rangarok.

name: Code S-44 : Episode 1
description: You are S-44, a pretty cool spider-bot able to climb everything. Sneak your way from the deepest slums to the highest heavily guarded buildings in order to save your best friend in the fantastic but dangerous town of New Bot City.

name: Alien Escape
description: Think in 360 degrees in Alien Escape to solve challenges a dark tower offers. You are a group of aliens that were kidnapped and jailed. To escape you have to solve puzzles where you have to do more than just jumping and running! Change your gravity and manipulate different objects in each room. Gravity, fire, water and a lot more will challenge you so much, you have to think around the corner!

name: Sabat Fight Arena
description: Sabat Fight Arena is a modern take on classic 3d fighter games. It’s a one of a kind competition complete with four-button control scheme which makes it easy for beginners.

name: Miami Resort
description: Exciting Match 3 resort construction in Miami! Master linked boards, discover hidden obstacles and choose from various buildings which impact your gameplay experience.

name: Monster Jam Steel Titans
description: Real Trucks. Real Action. Monster Jam! Monster Jam Steel Titans delivers the complete Monster Jam experience for everybody to enjoy!

name: Master of Secrets: Dark Europe
description: Finally! Now you are an apprentice of the greatest cryptography master ever! Now your life promises to be more exciting. All those mysteries, ciphers and riddles. Go from an amateur to the true master of encryption, unravel mysteries and figure out that some secrets shouldn't be revealed...

name: Iron Blade: Medieval RPG
description: Hack and slash your way through a medieval RPG full of demons, darkness and war!

name: Samurai Shodown
description:
"A brand new title from SNK! A new Samurai Shodown is on the horizon!

Since its birth in 1993, the Samurai Shodown series has been known as the premier weapon based versus fighting games, and was essential in cultivating the weapon based fighting game genre. As the first new release in the series in more than 10 years, Samurai Shodown is aiming to yet again push boundaries and deliver some serious samurai action!

Developed using Unreal Engine 4 and utilizing a unique brushstroke graphical style to match the Japanese roots of the series, Haohmaru, Nakoruru, Galford and a whole cast of other popular characters will battle once again for victory!"

name: Stick Runner: Operation Europe
description: Agent 00stix is tasked with taking down a criminal organization before their evil plan becomes the destruction of Europe. Race across the rooftops of 5 iconic countries in this secret-agent, parkour inspired game.

name: Freakout: Calamity TV Show
description: Freakout: Calamity TV Show is a juicy Top-Down-Dual-Stick-Shooter inspired by old school arcade games and more recent Die & Retry shooters.In a disturbed dystopia filled with mutants and killing machines, you’re the star of a reality show which might get a bit too real. Fight your way through the deadly enemy waves, join the revolution, and try to take down the evil Fizzy Corp.

name: Yoshi's Adventure 96: Puzzles for Yoshis
description: Sin descripción

name: Furry Girl Puzzle
description: A logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures with furry girls.

name: Tales from the Outer Zone: Fleshworms
description:
A catastrophic tale of hubris and oversized leeches.

First you fly..
Then you crash..
And finally you deal with.. THE FLESHWORMS!

name: Senran Kagura Reflexions: 30 Accessory Set
description: 30-Accessory Set is for use with Senran Kagura Reflexions.

name: Shall we date?: Mononoke Kiss x Lost Island
description:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Mononoke Kiss and Lost Island crossover.

name: Jungle Adventures 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Turovero: The Celestial Tower
description: Turovero: The Celestial Tower is a freeware, dark fantasy role-playing game created with RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 3
description: The 3rd Chapter of Dark Deception! New enemies await you in the next 2 nightmares. The darkness is growing and your demons are closing in. Can you change fate? Run or die - it's your choice!

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Wood's Queen 2019 Table
description: Wood's Queen 2019 Table is a modernized version of the original Wood's Queen table from 1976.

name: Zengeon
description: Zengeon is an anime infused Action RPG and Roguelite with a selection of unique characters and varying play-styles. Slaughter your way through demonic hordes and colossal bosses with hundreds of combination and skill possibilities!

name: Spider-Man: Far From Home Virtual Reality
description:
Your time to swing through New York like Spider-Man has finally arrived!
In breathtaking virtual reality, you’ll finally have the chance to scale and swing from the highest towers in Manhattan. Just pick one of four Spider-Man suits and you’ll be launched into the clouds… but keep your eyes and ears peeled, a colossal and dangerous enemy is waiting. Only you have the power to find and confront New York’s latest attacker in this thrilling, swinging adventure.

name: Lure: The King's Gold
